- This document contain useful functions for exploration of KUBE. 
- Alternative to open the file in Excel

Run this to load functions: 
```{r setup, include=FALSE, message=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(cache = F, echo = F)
source("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/helseprofil/KHvalitetskontroll/main/R/misc.R")
```
# Collection of useful commands for interactive check of KUBE

If the data file is not loaded in the environment, 
```{r}
dfnew <- ReadFile(file = "HKR_2022-09-27-16-27", # Matching, if >1 file found in folder, specify file name further
                  modus = "KH", # KH or NH
                  folder = "DATERT") # "DATERT" or 4-digit year if file in NESSTAR-folder
```

## Show full KUBE

```{r include = F, eval = F}
dfnew 
```
